title: MailflowAI
description: An AI-powered 24/7 customer service automation tool for e-commerce businesses which reduces monthly costs by $14K USD and reduces response times from hours to minutes.

title: BizReach Marketplace
description: Led a team of 5 in designing and developing a full-stack marketplace platform connecting mobile businesses with clients using the FERN stack, implementing AI-powered gig description generator with OpenAI API.

title: IoT Data Monitoring System
description: An IoT data monitoring system using TimescaleDB and TypeScript, generating and managing datasets exceeding 1 million records with optimized data retrieval using continuous aggregates.

title: Proxy Server
description: Implemented caching mechanisms for web content, reducing data retrieval times by 50% and enhancing server responsiveness using socket programming.

title: Network Simulation
description: Developed a network application that retrieves and displays web content from URLs, enhancing understanding of socket programming and TCP/IP protocols.

title: Delivery Service App
description: Developed a delivery tracking system with FastAPI and React, using Redis for caching and efficient data handling of delivery statuses and order updates.
